A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: From all of the previews\, the hype leading up to the movie\, and the setup in The Force Awakens\, The Last Jedi was really setup to blow away all expectations.  True the film does take some admirable risk and effort that went into producing this beautiful looking film\, constant tacky puns and unfulfilling character arcs limit this movie's potential.\n\nPlot holes seem to be plentiful\, and the twists that the plot does take in the movie just didn't speak to me.  They definitely wanted to shake things up but the presentation didn't strike me as \"space opera\".  Just moments of tension that either don't pay off or are interrupted with a joke and lives on the line.
